import React, { useState } from "react"; const Signup = () => { const [records, setRecords] = useState([]); const [userRegistration, setuserRegistration] = useState({ fname: "", lname: "", email: "", phone: "", password: "", cpassword: "" }); const handleInput = (e) => { const name = e.target.name; const value = e.target.value; console.log(name, value); setuserRegistration({ ...userRegistration, [name]: value }); } const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); const newRecord = { ...userRegistration, id: new Date().getTime().toString() } console.log(records); setRecords([...records, newRecord]); console.log(records); setuserRegistration({ fname: "", lname: "", email: "", phone: "", password: "", cpassword: "" }); } return ( // React Fragment short form Syntactic sugar <>

Welcome


    Register as a Client

    ) } export default Signup
